name: Namco Gallery Vol. 2
description:
Namco Gallery Vol. 2 is the second in a series of classic game compilations for the Game Boy. It includes four different games, all enhanced for the Super Game Boy, one of which is an all-new title.
  • Galaxian, previously only available for the Game Boy in Galaga & Galaxian
  • Dig Dug
  • The Tower of Druaga
  • Famista 4, an exclusive entry in Namco's baseball series
The cartridge includes in-game instructions and high scores for all games that are saved via password.
